publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-271# Ms Sandra White: It's Scotland's Oil—That the Parliament welcomes the comments by its former Presiding Officer, Sir David Steel, that the revenues from Scotland’s oil reserves should be placed under the control of the Parliament and believes that the Scottish Executive should support this welcome initiative from a leading Liberal Democrat figure and press Her Majesty’s Government for control of Scotland’s oil revenue to be placed in the hands of the Parliament. Supported by: Alex Neil*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-271# It's Scotland's Oil (lodged on 20 August 2003) Campbell Martin*
S2M-271# It's Scotland's Oil (lodged on 20 August 2003) Christine Grahame*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-271# It's Scotland's Oil (lodged on 20 August 2003) Shona Robison*
S2M-271# It's Scotland's Oil (lodged on 20 August 2003) Brian Adam*
S2M-271# It's Scotland's Oil (lodged on 20 August 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-271# It's Scotland's Oil (lodged on 20 August 2003) John Swinburne*
